info.title: GenHMS API
info.description:
This document provides the GenHMS Backend REST API interface. Test Server for GenHMS Backend REST API. https://hms.genyazilim.com/api Document Change Log | Published Date | Document Version Number | Description of Revision | |-------------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------| | 12.4.2023 | v1.0.0 | - Initial Pre-Alpha.
|

tags.name: Authentication Resource
tags.description: All the user authentication related api methods

tags.name: Lookup Resource
tags.description: All the api lookups related api methods

tags.name: Private Resource
tags.description: All the user private api methods

post.description: Generates new token pair with given username.
Adds ANT details based on the provided parameters.
Cancels orders for the provided user and cancellation details.

delete.description: Deletes ANT based on the provided parameters.

get.description: Fetches ANT details based on the provided parameters.
Fetches inpatients based on the provided parameters.

post.description: Fetches a list of doctors based on the search parameter.
Fetches information for the provided patients.
Fetches a list of order details for the provided arrivalId and file number.
Fetches a list of order histories for the provided file number.
Fetches a list of order plans for the provided file number.

get.description: Fetches ANTs of inpatients based on the provided parameters.

post.description: Fetches a list of services for the provided request data.
Fetches stock information for the provided user and stock request.
Fetches a list of order checks for the provided user.
Creates an order plan for the provided user and plan details.
Completes orders for the provided user and order details.

put.description: Updates ANT details based on the provided parameters.

get.description: Fetches a list of all allergies of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient whose allergy records will be drawn

get.description: Fetches a list of all contacts of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient whose contacts will be drawn

get.description: Fetches a list of all diseases of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient whose disease records will be drawn

get.description: Fetches a list of all family diseases of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient whose family disease records will be drawn

get.description: Fetches a list of all drug usages of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient whose drug records will be drawn

get.summary: Fetch all patients based on certain search criteria
get.description: This operation retrieves a list of PatientIdentity objects based on the provided search criteria. All criteria are optional and used for exact matches. The criteria include: name, surname, file number (DOSYANO), and social security number (SSN).

parameters.name: fileNo
parameters.description: The value that will be searched in DOSYANO values of patients. Exact search

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The text that will be searched in names of patients. Exact search

parameters.name: securityNumber
parameters.description: The text that will be searched in SSN values of patients. Exact search

parameters.name: surname
parameters.description: The text that will be searched in surnames of patients. Exact search

get.description: This operation retrieves a map of appointments for the logged-in doctor on a specific date. The date is calculated based on the provided page number, with each page representing a 12-day span from the current date. The method returns a map where the key is a date and the value is a list of DoctorAppointment objects for that date.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page index of the results

get.description: This operation retrieves a list of DoctorOrderPatientIdentity objects for the currently logged-in doctor. Optionally, a name search string can be provided, in which case only patients with a full name containing that string (case-insensitive) will be returned.

parameters.name: nameSearch
parameters.description: The text that will be searched in full name of patients

get.description: This operation retrieves a paginated list of DoctorPatientIdentity objects for the currently logged-in doctor. Optionally, a name search string can be provided, in which case only patients with a full name containing that string (case-insensitive) will be returned. Pagination is achieved by specifying the number of records to skip and the number of records to take.

parameters.name: nameSearch
parameters.description: The text that will be searched in full name of patients

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Amount of data in response that will be skipped

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Amount of data that will be present in response

put.description: This operation updates an order for a specific patient. The patient and order are identified using the provided patient ID and order details. The order can only be updated if its status (DURUM) is 0. If successful, the method updates the order's details including date of inclusion, plan date, date of change, changing doctor, notes, and verbal order.

post.description: This operation creates a new order for a specific patient and returns the created order. The patient is identified using the provided patient ID. The method also checks for the patient's arrival and verifies the patient's identity. The order details including date of inclusion, plan date, adding doctor, notes, doctor, order number, status, verbal order, arrival number, and arrival ID are all set and added.

delete.description: This operation deletes a specific order and its details associated with the provided patientand order ID. It first validates the existence of the patient and the order. The order can only bedeleted if its status (DURUM) is 0. If the order is successfully deleted, all order details linkedwith that order ID are also removed.

get.description: Fetches the image of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the user whose image will be drawn

get.description: Fetches the profile of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the user to be searched

get.summary: Generate and fetch a report in PDF format
get.description: This operation generates a report of a given type for a specific prescription and patient, and returns it in PDF format. The report type can be PRESCRIPTION, MEDICATION, RADIOLOGY, or PATHOLOGY.

parameters.name: prescriptionId
parameters.description: The id of the prescription to be queried

parameters.name: reportType
parameters.description: The type of the report to be generated

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient that report will belong to

get.summary: Fetch all reports for a user
get.description: Fetches a map of all reports for a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient whose reports will be drawn

get.description: Fetches a list of all surgeries of a user by the user's ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The id of the patient surgery records will be drawn

BearerAuthentication.description: Authentication needed to access core application
